hanzi-su-wiki:
療

Значения

Лечить

Мнемоника

Лечить болезнь 疒, устраняя её симптомы, иначе говоря, сигнальные костры (僚 без 亻). По другой версии — лечить дымом костра, которого боятся паразиты.

Варианты

疗
purpleculture_pinyin:
liáo
to treat; to cure; therapy
лечить; лечить; терапия
rtega_mnemonic:
療療RS
疗疗		heal, cure
  • treat sick people 疒 after a disaster 尞: heal
  • ⓢ treat a sick 疒 baby 了
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 疗)
Pictophonetic: 尞 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
療效 [ liáo xiào ]: healing efficacy; healing effect
療法 [ liáo fǎ ]: therapy; treatment
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 尞 [ liào ] fuel used for sacrifices
heisig_chinese_memo: In Final Fantasy 4, sleeping in a tent completely heals you and recovers all your HP and MP (and cures any sickness your characters may have).
heisig_constituent: heal, sickness, hospital, pup tent, large, St. Bernard, sun, day, small, little
koohiiStory1: On the battlefield, the only place to heal from your sickness is inside the medic's pup tent. Think of M.A.S.H.
koohiiStory2: Sick caveman has to sleep in his pup tent. Not the cave because to humid and cold but a nice small pup tent in the sun will heal him from his cold.
jp_example_words:
診療(しんりょう): medical examination and treatment, diagnosis
治療(ちりょう): medical treatment
医療(いりょう): medical care, medical treatment
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If someone is sick feed them charcoal to heal them. Okay, so maybe you shouldn't feed it directly to them, but charcoal has amazing water filtration powers. So put charcoal in their water and the water will heal them right up.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being sick. Like sick as a dog sick. And then you take some charcoal, put it into your drinking water, and then you're healed!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You aren't the only one that needs to be healed, so you take your row (りょう) boat out onto the lake where your town gets its drinking water and you dump a bunch of charcoal into it! Now everyone will be healed when they drink.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself rowing your row boat into the lake with huge chunks of solid charcoal. You carefully break them up and toss them over the side, so you can heal everyone.
Ru_Notes:
Сравни: 寮 (リョウ общежитие), 僚 (リョウ коллега)
Радикал "болезнь" (疒): кандзи, содержащие компонент 疒, почти все связаны с болезнями.
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 并, 小 (маленький), 日 (день), 疔 (фурункул)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: complementary (尞) to an illness (疒) is a cure
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: For the doctors to cure you, your sickness must be treat-ed with medicine.
humanum_full_description_en: From "疒", "尞" sound. "Shuowen" thought it was the or form of " 𤻲 ", but in ancient books, " treatment " was used more often than " 𤻲 ". The original meaning is healing and treatment. "Said the text": "𤻲, cure also. From 疒, music. Cure, or from 尞." Such as "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Ulcer Doctor": "Where to treat an ulcer, use the five poisons to attack it, use the five qi to nourish it, use the five drugs to treat it, and use the five flavor festivals." "Warring States Policy. "Zhongshan Strategy": "Zhao people cannot accept the dead, and the wounded cannot be healed. They cry and weep and mourn each other. They work hard together and work hard to make money."
humanum_short_description_en: From "疒", "尞" sound. The original meaning is healing and treatment.
humanum_full_description: 從「疒」，「尞」聲。《說文》以為是「𤻲」的或體，但古書中多用「療」而少用「𤻲」。本義是醫治、治療。《說文》：「𤻲，治也。从疒，樂聲。療，或从尞。」如《周禮．天官．瘍醫》：「凡療瘍，以五毒攻之，以五氣養之，以五藥療之，以五味節之。」《戰國策．中山策》：「趙人之死者不得收，傷者不得療，涕泣相哀，勠力同憂，耕田疾作，以生其財。」
humanum_short_description: 從「疒」，「尞」聲。本義是醫治、治療。

從「 疒 」，「 尞 」聲。《說文》以為是「 𤻲 」的或體，但古書中多用「 療 」而少用「 𤻲 」。本義是醫治、治療。《說文》：「𤻲，治也。从疒，樂聲。療，或从尞。」如《周禮．天官．瘍醫》：「凡療瘍，以五毒攻之，以五氣養之，以五藥療之，以五味節之。」《戰國策．中山策》：「趙人之死者不得收，傷者不得療，涕泣相哀，勠力同憂，耕田疾作，以生其財。」
From " 疒", " 尞" sound. "Shuowen" thought it was the or form of " 𤻲", but in ancient books, " treatment" was used more often than " 𤻲". The original meaning is healing and treatment. "Said the text": "𤻲, cure also. From 疒, music. Cure, or from 尞." Such as "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Ulcer Doctor": "Where to treat an ulcer, use the five poisons to attack it, use the five qi to nourish it, use the five drugs to treat it, and use the five flavor festivals." "Warring States Policy. "Zhongshan Strategy": "Zhao people cannot accept the dead, and the wounded cannot be healed. They cry and weep and mourn each other. They work hard together and work hard to make money."

療字的基本解释

療
liáo
见“疗”。

療字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《廣韻》力照切，去笑，來。］
“樂5”的被通假字。“疗1”的繁体字。
(1)医治；治疗。
(2)止；解除；治。'

療字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　療； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页780第19
【廣韻】【集韻】力照切【正韻】力弔切，?音料。【說文】治也。【揚子·方言】療，治也。江湘郊會謂醫治之曰愮，或曰療。【周禮·天官·瘍醫】凡療瘍，以五毒攻之。【註】止病曰療。【四皓采芝操】曄曄紫芝，可以療饑。　又【集韻】式灼切，音鑠。與?同。病也。

療字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

Name meaning

liáo, liào, shuò
вм. 疗
Radicals: 疒, 尞  (sick, charcoal)
Meaning Mnemonic
If someone is sick feed them charcoal to heal them. Okay, so maybe you shouldn't feed it directly to them, but charcoal has amazing water filtration powers. So put charcoal in their water and the water will heal them right up.
Imagine being sick. Like sick as a dog sick. And then you take some charcoal, put it into your drinking water, and then you're healed!
Reading Mnemonic
You aren't the only one that needs to be healed, so you take your row (りょう) boat out onto the lake where your town gets its drinking water and you dump a bunch of charcoal into it! Now everyone will be healed when they drink.
Picture yourself rowing your row boat into the lake with huge chunks of solid charcoal. You carefully break them up and toss them over the side, so you can heal everyone.
